mapper.select: SELECT search_loc FROM (SELECT search_loc,search_hit, rownum FROM search ORDER BY search_hit DESC) WHERE rownum<=2

SELECT text_no,text_loc,text_tour_date,text_cost,text_hit FROM (SELECT text_no, text_loc, text_tour_date, text_cost, text_hit, rownum FROM(SELECT text_no, text_loc, text_tour_date, text_cost, text_hit, today FROM allGuideInfo_view, (SELECT a||'/'||b as today FROM(SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'MM/DD') as a, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY') as b FROM DUAL)) WHERE text_loc = #{search_loc} AND text_tour_date >= today ORDER BY text_hit DESC) ) WHERE rownum<=10
